channel.title: [delta][317]Multiple connections[317][delta]
channel.description: How do i enable this? please help.

item.title: [delta][317]Multiple connections[317][delta]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“djfinger, post:6, topic:381394”]heyy well i can multi log in to my server
but when my brother tries to login from a different pc in the same house it wont allow him to .
any ideas how to fix that?[/quote]
Old post, but are you using Delta? If so, do the same thing as I stated above.

Read full topic

item.title: [delta][317]Multiple connections[317][delta]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Yeah, if not commented, it allows only one connection per IP; Otherwise, it allows as many connections your server can handle.

Read full topic

item.title: [delta][317]Multiple connections[317][delta]
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

[quote=“sageofmali, post:2, topic:381394”]From the same IP? If so, go into the client class(server-sided) and search: for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ and comment out the whole thing so it looks like: /* for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null && !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) && playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){ sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; return; } } */[/quote]idk but that might work i dont code delta but u gota coment it out

Read full topic
